titles.title: Except the Lord Build the House

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Except the Lord build the house
We labor in vain
Except the Lord keep this city,
the watchman waketh in vain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord hath done great things for us,
whereof we are glad
Turn again our captivity
o lord, as streams in the south.
they that sow in tears shall reap in joy
he that goeth forth and weepeth,
bearing precious seed
shall doubtless come again with rejoicing
bringin his sheaves with him.
